directions: In a blender, puree peaches, buttermilk, ice cubes, sugar, cardamom, cumin, salt and liqueur, if desired, until smooth and frothy. Add sugar to taste. Divide among 4 glasses and top with pistachios. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 1/2 lb ripe peaches (about 5 medium) quartered and pitted (4 cups)
1/4 cup sugar, plus more to taste
2 tablespoons shelled unsalted pistachios, coarsely chopped
title: Spiced Peach Lassi
